duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms and enterprise voice and video architecture.
Develop the strategic IT plan to enable voice and video services delivery and investment roadmap for future voice services.
Define and maintain all voice and video service’s key performance indicator (KPI) metrics.
Manage the design and approach to access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all services.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning and testing.
Define and deliver continuous improvement plans and programs for system availability and performance improvements.
Collaborate with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives and participate in discussions with vendors and suppliers to resolve critical network issues.
Serve as technical mentor for staff through sharing knowledge and development of staff, and communicating architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders.
Comply with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science)
